TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EncryptedType extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示从中派生 和 类的抽象基类。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which the classes and derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示 和 派生的类的抽象基类。The class represents the abstract base class from which the classes and derive. 这两个类包含 XML 加密中的实际加密数据或关键信息。These two classes contain the actual encrypted data or key information in XML encryption. 若要符合 XML 加密标准，应使用这两个派生类。To comply with XML encryption standards, you should use these two derived classes. 有关 XML 加密标准的详细信息，请参阅[Xml 加密语法和处理版本 1.1](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)。For more information on XML encryption standards, see [XML Encryption Syntax and Processing Version 1.1](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用派生自 类的 类对 XML 元素进行加密和解密。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType/vb/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `` 元素是 XML 加密中提供加密数据的必需元素。The `` element is a required element in XML encryption that provides the encrypted data. 它必须包含加密的八进制序列作为 属性的 base64 编码文本，或使用 属性提供对包含加密的八进制序列的外部位置的引用。It must either contain the encrypted octet sequence as the base64-encoded text of the property, or provide a reference to an external location containing the encrypted octet sequence using the property. 有关此元素的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about this element, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用派生自 类的 类对 XML 元素进行加密和解密。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性描述加密数据的编码。This property describes the encoding of the encrypted data. 例如，如果加密数据是 base64 编码的 PNG，则可以将编码指定为 ""。For example, if the encrypted data is a base64-encoded PNG, the encoding could be specified as ''. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用派生自 类的 类对 XML 元素进行加密和解密。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. 然后，此示例向控制台显示 类的各种属性。This sample then displays various properties of the class to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks `` 是描述应用于加密数据的加密算法的可选元素。The `` is an optional element that describes the encryption algorithm applied to the encrypted data. 如果该元素不存在，则该加密算法必须由接收方知道，否则解密将失败。If the element is absent, the encryption algorithm must be known by the recipient or decryption will fail. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用派生自 类的 类对 XML 元素进行加密和解密。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks `` 元素可以包含与创建 实例有关的其他信息，例如日期和时间戳或加密期间使用的加密硬件的序列号。The `` element can contain additional information about the creation of the instance, such as a date and time stamp or the serial number of cryptographic hardware used during encryption. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用派生自 类的 类对 XML 元素进行加密和解密。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. 然后，此示例向控制台显示 类的各种属性。This sample then displays various properties of the class to the console. MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string MimeType { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property MimeType As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ MimeType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MimeType : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 加密中某个 实例的 特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attribute of an instance in XML encryption.

value.span: 描述加密数据介质类型的字符串。

span.span: A string that describes the media type of the encrypted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `MimeType` 属性是一个可选属性，用于描述加密数据的媒体类型。The `MimeType` attribute is an optional attribute that describes the media type of the encrypted data. 此属性的值是一个字符串，其中包含 RFC 2045 定义的值：[多用途 Internet 邮件扩展（MIME）第一部分： Internet 消息正文的格式](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2045.txt)。The value of this attribute is a string with values defined by [RFC 2045: Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) Part One: Format of Internet Message Bodies](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2045.txt). 例如，如果加密的数据是 base64 编码的 PNG，则 `Encoding` 属性将为 ""，`MimeType` 为 "image/PNG"。For example, if the data that is encrypted is a base64-encoded PNG, the `Encoding` attribute would be '' and the `MimeType` would be 'image/png'. 此属性是可选的，不需要 `MimeType` 信息的验证。This attribute is optional and no validation of the `MimeType` information is required. 属性不指示加密应用程序必须执行任何其他处理。The attribute does not indicate that the encryption application must do any additional processing. 请注意，如果此信息已绑定到 `Type` 属性中的标识符，则可能不需要此信息。Note that this information may not be necessary if it is already bound to the identifier in the `Type` attribute. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用派生自 类的 类对 XML 元素进行加密和解密。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. 然后，此示例向控制台显示 类的各种属性。This sample then displays various properties of the class to the console. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData/vb/sample.vb#1)]

Public Overridable Property Type As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Type { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Type : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 加密中某个 实例的 特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attribute of an instance in XML encryption.

value.span: 描述加密数据文本格式的字符串。

span.span: A string that describes the text form of the encrypted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Type` 属性是一个可选属性，用于标识有关加密内容的文本格式的类型信息。The `Type` attribute is an optional attribute that identifies type information about the text form of the encrypted content. 尽管是可选的，但这是一个重要的属性，它在[处理规则4.2：](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/) XML 加密语法和处理规范（https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)）中所述的强制处理中使用。While optional, this is an important attribute and is used in mandatory processing described in [Processing Rules: Decryption](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/) (section 4.2) of the XML Encryption Syntax and Processing specification (https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/). 如果 `` 元素包含 `'element'` 或元素 `'content'`类型的数据，并在 XML 文档中替换该数据，则强烈建议提供 `Type` 特性。If the `` element contains data of type `'element'` or element `'content'`, and replaces that data in an XML document, it is strongly recommended that the `Type` attribute be provided. 如果没有此信息，尝试解密信息的应用程序将无法自动将 XML 文档还原到其原始文本格式。Without this information, the application attempting to decrypt the information will be unable to automatically restore the XML document to its original text form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用派生自 类的 类对 XML 元素进行加密和解密。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType/vb/sample.vb#1)]
